casebody.data:
JAY COCHRAN FBFS, INC., a Montana corporation, Plaintiff and Appellee,
v.
Kurt James FAUTH and SY Sales, LLC, a Montana limited liability company d/b/a Fauth Agency, Defendants and Appellants. DA 18-0447 Supreme Court of Montana. Submitted on Briefs: February 20, 2019
Decided: April 23, 2019

Affirmed in part. Reversed and remanded in part.
